name: edu.psu.tlt.puppetjump
description:
PuppetJump is a physics based VR framework for Unity.
It will serve as the middleware between Unity and your VR project.
For more information, and tutorials on how to use PuppetJump, please visit:
https://sites.psu.edu/puppetjump

samples.description: Demo the core functionality of PuppetJump.
Demo a collection of Unity World Space Canvas UI elements that are fully integrated with PuppetJump.
Demo a collection of 3D UI elements that are fully integrated with PuppetJump.
